ygData.subject: Re: Problems connecting
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Did you install Direct X 8.1.  This may be the problem.  I have seen this in the past and if I am not mistaken that is the fix to it.  I do asume that
ygData.messageBody:
Hello

Did you install Direct X 8.1. This may be the problem. I have seen
this in the past and if I am not mistaken that is the fix to it. I
do asume that when you installed the hard drive you also install the
OS as well. If you do not have the current Direct X you can get if
from the Microsoft Updates Page. I hope this helps.

Christine


--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Steven R. Hulse" <steveh@m...>
wrote:
> Hi gang,
> I have recently installed a new HD in my PC and re-installed
EQ.
> Now whenever I go to log in and play it tells me that "eqgame.exe
has
> generated errors and is being closed by Windows." This is only when
I go
> to play, I can get into chat fine. I have un-installed and re-
installed
> EQ twice and I still get the error. Has anyone else been getting
this
> message or does anyone have any ideas how to fix it? All my drivers
are
> up to date btw.
>
>
> Thanks!
> Durgaa
